r.s: A Druid driver for PHP with PECL extension.
r.d: A Druid driver for PHP with PECL extension. - Build Druid REST Client Use CURL. - Request both with Full-Json or Templates-Json
r.n: - Fix #2 missing extension dependencies - Fix #3 Support PHP 7. - Support config curl_dns_cache_timeout,curl_connect_timeout,curl_timeout.
